titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Andrew's Plymouth, January 30th, 1698/9 by John Gilbert ... ; with a preface defending King Charles the martyr, and the observation of his day, against the libels, and practice of such, who are enemies to both.
titleStmt.author: Gilbert, John, d. 1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Sam Darker, for Tho. Bennet ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Canon Gilbert's sermon preached at St. Andrew's Plymouth, January 30th, 1698/9.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
